scripts.build: lerna bootstrap -- -production=false && npx tsc --project ./packages/asuna-data/tsconfig.json && npx tsc --project ./packages/asuna-cubism-framework/tsconfig.json && npx webpack build --config ./packages/asuna-web-live2d/webpack.config && npx webpack build --config ./packages/asuna-web-viewer-client/webpack.config && npx webpack build --config ./packages/asuna-web-swap-client/webpack.config
